Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-23359 affecting package nvidia-container-toolkit for versions less than 1.17.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-23359 affecting package nvidia-container-toolkit for versions less than 1.17.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nvidia-container-toolkit is earlier than 1.17.4-1, affected by CVE-2025-23359
